Troop[10].pages[3].message[0].textLine[2: You interrupt priest from his chant and summoning with your
Troop[10].pages[3].message[1].textLine[1: "You are another priest of destruction it seems..."
Troop[10].pages[4].message[2].textLine[1: "I am but a wretched being on a holy pilgrimage."
Troop[10].pages[4].message[3].textLine[1: "All the priests of the western world dream of delving down
Troop[10].pages[4].message[4].textLine[1: "We serve all the gods. Despite the common folk blaming
Troop[10].pages[4].message[4].textLine[2: the dark times on the older gods, we also value their
Troop[10].pages[4].message[5].textLine[1: "Gro-goroth, Sylvian or Alll-mer the ascended one.
Troop[10].pages[4].message[7].textLine[1: "Gro-goroth. He who is followed by death
Troop[10].pages[4].message[8].textLine[1: "The goddess... She is the opposite to Gro-goroth and brings
Troop[10].pages[4].message[11].textLine[: "Roughly 800 years ago mankind decided to take the reins
in their own hands. We had suffered long enough because of
the neglect of the older gods."
Troop[10].pages[4].message[12].textLine[: "New gods will bring us closer to the paradise..."
Troop[10].pages[4].message[13].textLine[: "The dungeons of fear and hunger. A nexus for
Troop[10].pages[4].message[14].textLine[: "These dungeons are one of the last places where
a man can still meet his creators."
Troop[10].pages[4].message[15].textLine[: "My work here is not done yet."

Troop[122].pages[1].message[0].textLine[: "The only place where I can truly be free, are my dreams."
Troop[122].pages[1].message[1].textLine[: "In the vast open plains of this netherworld, I hold no burden
over the worries of my past life."
Troop[122].pages[1].message[2].textLine[: "Of course this is a flawed logic..."
Troop[122].pages[1].message[3].textLine[: "One should not bind oneself to a set location, one should
be able to wander the world like a wind."
Troop[122].pages[1].message[4].textLine[: "But even gods are allowed to have flaws, no?"
Troop[122].pages[2].message[0].textLine[: As time will pass, will you tell people about your monumental
Troop[122].pages[2].message[1].textLine[: How you passed through all the hardships the dungeons laid
before you and about you eventual ascension?
Troop[122].pages[2].message[3].textLine[: Stories about your fabled endeavours are passed to people
of all ages. Your tales inspire many in the times to come
Troop[122].pages[2].message[4].textLine[: Your story is left unspoken and unsung. There are rumours here
and there but for the most part, the era of the new gods
Troop[122].pages[2].message[5].textLine[: In the coming era, mankind is at the brink of chaos. Diseases
run wild and kingdoms wage war with hundreds of thousands
of casualties on all fronts, both women and children included.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[6].textLine[: You would have the power to interrupt and potentially stop
this. You have the strength to stop the mindless killing.
But that would require you to step out of the plain of this
Troop[122].pages[2].message[7].textLine[: Instead, you could try to affect mankind through religion
and beliefs. Affecting the whole culture means slow change
and its effects don't save those in immediate peril, but
religion might have more long-lasting effects.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[8].textChoic: Save the mankind with your strength
Troop[122].pages[2].message[9].textLine[: You leave your golden throne to disrupt the ongoing wars.
With overwhelming strength you crush entire armies that stand
in your way. Kings and sultans of the time are left in terror
Troop[122].pages[2].message[10].textLine: Once you are done with your rage, mankind is left in a
state of chaos. Common people got no one to turn onto and
thus they seek safety from smaller tribes and communes.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[11].textLine: By meddling with the mankind, you ended up halting the
technological and cultural progress. People are also less
self-imposed because of relying on gods in the past.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[12].textLine: The civilizations are back to iron age-like structure where
physical strength is the only thing that matters.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[13].textLine: You watch other deities and gods fall around you one by
one as men revolt against old world order.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[14].textLine: However, your gospel back in the day was so strong that
people remember it loud and clear.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[15].textLine: Your legacy had only grown stronger with you crushing the
warring kingdoms before the chaos began.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[17].textLine: You are known as the fierce god and because there are no
other gods left to rival your power, you become the one and
only god despite your strength being limited to that of a
Troop[122].pages[2].message[18].textLine: The harsh times breed harsh men. Mankind is physically in
its peak condition because of the warring tribes.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[19].textLine: Because there is no centralized civilization, creating a
strong uniform religion proves out to be difficult.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[20].textLine: With all new understanding of morals and customs, people
riot against the gods of older times.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[21].textLine: You manage to withstand against the oncoming forces for
some time but eventually among mankind there appears a
Troop[122].pages[2].message[22].textLine: You are beheaded and your mutilated torso is put on display.
You become a symbol of old and in this way you are remembered
Troop[122].pages[2].message[23].textLine: Slowly in times of despair, people start to turn to your
Troop[122].pages[2].message[24].textLine: Many are killed and every new victim feeds the ongoing
plague and destruction. This age would be known as the dark
age in the history books, but your light would become an
important factor in the survival of civilizations.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[25].textLine: You are known to men as the merciful god. New deities and
false apostles rise as decades go by, but the foundation you
laid during the dark age made you the pillar of morals for
Troop[122].pages[2].message[26].textLine: Even if your power is limited to that of the new gods, your
legacy would eventually rival that of older gods...
Troop[122].pages[2].message[27].textLine: Sadly only few people find their way to your teachings
because of your relatively less-known status.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[28].textLine: At best, you manage to form a cult around your religion. But
because anyone who follows you is condemned as heretic in
these times of great peril and prejudice, your followers
resort to dark arts and dubious methods in order to survive.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[29].textLine: Centuries later you still manage to hang onto your cult
status. However, generations of degenerative methods inside
your cult has lead it becoming very notorious around modern
Troop[122].pages[2].message[30].textLine: You are considered far from the most notable gods and
generally your followers are spit upon of the city streets.
Troop[122].pages[2].message[31].textLine: With your legacy dying, so does your strength. You are
dethroned as time goes on by the new generation of new
Troop[122].pages[2].message[32].textLine: You are forgotten in the sands of time...

Troop[123].pages[1].message[2].textLine[: "There is no shame in admitting that you want power over
Troop[123].pages[1].message[3].textLine[: "You, yourself have sought domination by getting this far.
You wanted to prove the others that you got what it takes."

Troop[124].pages[1].message[0].textLine[: "Knowledge... It suffocates those who are not able to
Troop[124].pages[1].message[1].textLine[: "I could not bear the world with everything I've learned
with the enlightenment and my ascension."
Troop[124].pages[1].message[2].textLine[: "It is said that ignorance is bliss and the knowledge only
Troop[124].pages[1].message[3].textLine[: "The only way for me to continue existing was to change.
Knowledge changes one permanently. There is no looking back
Troop[124].pages[2].message[0].textLine[: As time will pass, will you tell people about your monumental
Troop[124].pages[2].message[1].textLine[: How you passed through all the hardships the dungeons laid
before you and about you eventual ascension?
Troop[124].pages[2].message[3].textLine[: Stories about your fabled endeavours are passed to people
of all ages. Your tales inspire many in the times to come
Troop[124].pages[2].message[4].textLine[: Your story is left unspoken and unsung. There are rumours here
and there but for the most part, the era of the new gods
Troop[124].pages[2].message[5].textLine[: In the coming era, mankind is at the brink of chaos. Diseases
run wild and kingdoms wage war with hundreds of thousands
of casualties on all fronts, both women and children included.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[6].textLine[: You would have the power to interrupt and potentially stop
this. You have the strength to stop the mindless killing.
But that would require you to step out of the plain of this
Troop[124].pages[2].message[7].textLine[: Instead, you could try to affect mankind through religion
and beliefs. Affecting the whole culture means slow change
and its effects don't save those in immediate peril, but
religion might have more long-lasting effects.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[8].textChoic: Save the mankind with your strength
Troop[124].pages[2].message[9].textLine[: You leave your golden throne to disrupt the ongoing wars.
With overwhelming strength you crush entire armies that stand
in your way. Kings and sultans of the time are left in terror
Troop[124].pages[2].message[10].textLine: Once you are done with your rage, mankind is left in a
state of chaos. Common people got no one to turn onto and
thus they seek safety from smaller tribes and communes.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[11].textLine: By meddling with the mankind, you ended up halting the
technological and cultural progress. People are also less
self-imposed because of relying on gods in the past.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[12].textLine: The civilizations are back to iron age-like structure where
physical strength is the only thing that matters.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[13].textLine: You watch other deities and gods fall around you one by
one as men revolt against old world order.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[14].textLine: However, your gospel back in the day was so strong that
people remember it loud and clear.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[15].textLine: Your legacy had only grown stronger with you crushing the
warring kingdoms before the chaos began.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[17].textLine: You are known as the fierce god and because there are no
other gods left to rival your power, you become the one and
only god despite your strength being limited to that of a
Troop[124].pages[2].message[18].textLine: The harsh times breed harsh men. Mankind is physically in
its peak condition because of the warring tribes.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[19].textLine: Because there is no centralized civilization, creating a
strong uniform religion proves out to be difficult.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[20].textLine: With all new understanding of morals and customs, people
riot against the gods of older times.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[21].textLine: You manage to withstand against the oncoming forces for
some time but eventually among mankind there appears a
Troop[124].pages[2].message[22].textLine: You are beheaded and your mutilated torso is put on display.
You become a symbol of old and in this way you are remembered
Troop[124].pages[2].message[23].textLine: Slowly in times of despair, people start to turn to your
Troop[124].pages[2].message[24].textLine: Many are killed and every new victim feeds the ongoing
plague and destruction. This age would be known as the dark
age in the history books, but your light would become an
important factor in the survival of civilizations.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[25].textLine: You are known to men as the merciful god. New deities and
false apostles rise as decades go by, but the foundation you
laid during the dark age made you the pillar of morals for
Troop[124].pages[2].message[26].textLine: Even if your power is limited to that of the new gods, your
legacy would eventually rival that of older gods...
Troop[124].pages[2].message[27].textLine: Sadly only few people find their way to your teachings
because of your relatively less-known status.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[28].textLine: At best, you manage to form a cult around your religion. But
because anyone who follows you is condemned as heretic in
these times of great peril and prejudice, your followers
resort to dark arts and dubious methods in order to survive.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[29].textLine: Centuries later you still manage to hang onto your cult
status. However, generations of degenerative methods inside
your cult has lead it becoming very notorious around modern
Troop[124].pages[2].message[30].textLine: You are considered far from the most notable gods and
generally your followers are spit upon of the city streets.
Troop[124].pages[2].message[31].textLine: With your legacy dying, so does your strength. You are
dethroned as time goes on by the new generation of new
Troop[124].pages[2].message[32].textLine: You are forgotten in the sands of time...
Troop[125].pages[1].message[0].textLine[: "I've grown to love my torment and suffering."
Troop[125].pages[1].message[1].textLine[: "I curse my place in this universe. I curse the fate that
has been laid in front of me. But I've grown to love it as
Troop[125].pages[1].message[2].textLine[: "Suffering alters my sight. I can use the energy to my
advantage. It is like an ancient secret that was revealed
to me in my darknest hour. A secret only I am aware of."

Troop[126].pages[0].message[0].textLine[: You try talking some sense to Le'garde...
Troop[126].pages[0].message[2].textLine[: "You must mean what happened to the man known as Le'garde?"
Troop[126].pages[0].message[3].textLine[: "A wonderful thing happened to him and he is no more."
Troop[126].pages[0].message[4].textLine[: "I'm afraid I cannot share this power with anyone, thus
Troop[126].pages[0].message[5].textLine[: The new god smiles at you.
Troop[126].pages[0].message[6].textLine[: "You plan on killing a newborn god?"
Troop[126].pages[0].message[7].textLine[: The new god smiles at you.

Troop[126].pages[1].message[12].textLine: "What is this bullshit you're spewing at me!!?"
Troop[126].pages[1].message[13].textLine: "Trying to make me a punching bag you miserable worm!!?"

Troop[126].pages[10].message[1].textLine: "You do not have to struggle anymore."
Troop[126].pages[10].message[3].textLine: Slowly the fingers of the new god close in on you...
Troop[126].pages[10].message[4].textLine: The new god only touches you gently. You feel a cold shiver
Troop[126].pages[10].message[5].textLine: Blood gushes from your eye sockets and you lose your sight.
Troop[126].pages[10].message[6].textLine: There's an intense pain inside your head and you collapse.
